title.rendered: [2 in 1 Pack] aLLreli USB C to USB Adapter, Type C 3.0 Adapter, Allows Micro USB to USB-C Data Transfer with Key ring…

content.rendered:
(*1*)

2 in 1 Set- An Excellent Gift for the Electronics Lover

One Type C to Micro USB adapter and one USB-C to USB 3.0 with OTG operate adapter set totally meet your all wants. No matter the way you need flash driver or micro usb cable even mouse to join Type-C inputs, Type-C to Micro USB and USB-C to USB 3.0 can simply meet your all wants.

Compatible With Most Type C Devices
Various cell phones and laptops that help Type-C.

Make positive this matches by coming into your mannequin quantity.
[USB 3.0 Super Speed] The information switch velocity is up to 5Gbps. More environment friendly and handy for USB C to USB adapter.
[Super Durable] Zinc alloy physique prevents scratches. Premium USB C connector passes 10,000+ Push/Pull Test.
[Plug & Play] OTG adapter. No extra driver/software program wanted. Simple Thunderbolt 3 to USB adapter.
[Universal Compatibility] Compatible with laptop computer/pill/smartphone with a USB Type-C port together with Macbook Pro 2019/2018/2017, MacBook Air 2018, Nintendo Switch, Samsung Galaxy S8/S9.
[Easy to Carry] It is Not Easy to Lose-The Adapter is designed with Keyring, you’ll be able to dangle it on the telephone, cable and so on, it’s straightforward to carry and won’t be misplaced.
